headline.print_headline: Ukraine’s Detention of 2 Servicemen Ignites Dispute With Russia
headline.main: Ukraine’s Detention of 2 Servicemen Ignites Dispute With Russia

snippet: Russia said that Ukrainian Security Service operatives had abducted two of its servicemen, who were later described by Kiev as deserters from the Ukrainian Army....
lead_paragraph: Russia said that Ukrainian Security Service operatives had abducted two of its servicemen, who were later described by Kiev as deserters from the Ukrainian Army.
